item.description:
We are all experts at shooting the bull by now, so let's take our skills to the next level and shoot some pool at the same time!

This is a great place with a full bar (lots of flavored vodka). As well as pool, they have darts, both real and electronic.

There will be a couple of other Meetup groups there...Fairfield County Beer Lovers and also Shoot The Bull. So come join us for a night of fun and laughs.

On Cue
50 Washington St.
Norwalk, Connecticut CT 06854
(203) 831-0743
http://www.oncuebilli....

Park in the 50 Washington Street lot (by the movie theater) in Sono. In the lot, walk to the 50 Washington Street Building, the entrance is on the far left. There is a flight of stairs going down.
item.name: Shooting Some Bull and Pool...
